body:
Hi Brandon, 
 
On 30 Apr 2010, at 17:14, Brandon Moon wrote: 
 
[..] 
> I also tried attaching VisualVM to it, but I couldn't even see the 
> thread dump option. 
The easiest way is to right-click on your application and invoke 
'Thread Dump' from a context menu. 
 
Bye, 
-- 
Tomas Hurka 
NetBeans Profiler http://profiler.netbeans.org 
VisualVM http://visualvm.dev.java.net 
Software Engineer, Developer Platforms Group 
Sun Microsystems, Praha Czech Republic

subject: Re: Problem detecting sleep in 10.6
